# KrHttpDownloads class

Helper methods for common HTTP download scenarios.

```csharp
public static class KrHttpDownloads
```

## Public Members

| name | description |
| --- | --- |
| static [DownloadToFileAsync](KrHttpDownloads/DownloadToFileAsync)(…) | Streams an HTTP response body to a file, supporting very large payloads and optional resume. Returns the final file length in bytes. |
